sources.label: Scary Squids
sources.description: Scary Squids is a music review site, created and maintained by me (Ben Martin). I like reviewing albums, and plan to start sharing new (and old) music that I like on this site. While I am a music listener first and foremost, I also have recorded some albums. One is called “Days and Dreams” and it’s a solo record, and another is called “Voices”, and it’s an instrumental rock record I did with a band called Room For A Ghost.

sources.label: KEXP Song of the Day
sources.description: KEXP is more than a radio station. KEXP is a dynamic arts organization that provides rich music experiences on the air, online, and on the streets. KEXPs unique services benefit three distinct groups: Music Lovers, Artists, and the Arts Community. KEXPs curatorial staff of 40 DJs, who are widely recognized as experts in their field, present the newest emerging popular artists alongside established bands. KEXPs programming features both variety and specialty shows that brings you the emerging sounds and long-time favorites from the Pacific Northwest, the country, and throughout the world.
